results.prompt_text:
The stars were twinkling in the night,
The lanterns cast a golden light.
She wandered in the dark about,
And found a hidden passage

A sailor sailed across the bay,
And dreamed of home throughout the day.
He raised his voice and gave a shout,
The truth was struggling to come

The sun goes up, the sun goes down,
The moon shines bright above the town.
Nobody knows or remembers who,
Would come to find a way back

A sailor sailed across the bay,
And dreamed of home throughout the day.
The world keeps spinning even so,
There is so much we do not
